name: Word Chai
description:
Word Chai with ultimate puzzles can sharpen your brain in a leisure way! This word game is simple and free but tremendously brain challenging and highly addictive.

Word Chai is a brand new leisure mobile game. Hundreds of new levels with modern words were updated and all you need is word searching, anagrams, and crosswords!

Game Features :
Slide letters to make them a word, then get gold coins as rewards!
No time limits, take your time and play it leisurely.
Totally free for any player
Suitable for both kids and adults to play.
Support off line mode, you can play it anywhere you like with no worry of WIFI connection
Release your pressure and get simple fun as well as stimulate your mind
Lot of delicate wallpaper for you, make your own choice.
Available on your mobile phone and tablet.

Have a nice little brick and enjoy this lovely game!
We are waiting for you to join!
